div.class: o_colored_level o_grid_item g-height-6 g-col-lg-8 col-lg-8 order-lg-0

p.span:
At 
E-stic, you can learn as a student or guide others as a mentor.Whether you want to revise for exams or share your expertise, there’s a place for you here.

div.class: o_colored_level o_grid_item rounded g-height-2 g-col-lg-5 col-lg-5 order-lg-0
div.style: z-index: 0; background-color: rgba(246, 244, 255, 0); --grid-item-padding-x: 30px; grid-area: 8 / 6 / 10 / 11; border-radius: 30px !important; order: 1;
div.h3: Be our student and improve your exam results

div.class: o_colored_level o_grid_item rounded g-height-5 g-col-lg-7 col-lg-7 order-lg-0
div.style: z-index: 0; background-color: rgba(246, 244, 255, 0); --grid-item-padding-x: 30px; grid-area: 10 / 6 / 15 / 13; border-radius: 30px !important; order: 3;
div.p: As a student on E-Stic, you get access to clear, exam-focused explanations made by peers who excelled in the same subjects.
You’ll be able to learn at your own rhythm, revisit lessons whenever you need, and gain confidence for your exams.
With every course, you’re not only preparing smarter, but also joining a community where your feedback helps make learning even better.

a.style: border-width: 0px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(123, 63, 242); background-color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 0);

div.class: o_colored_level o_grid_item rounded g-col-lg-6 g-height-2 col-lg-6 order-lg-0
div.style: z-index: 0; background-color: rgba(246, 244, 255, 0); --grid-item-padding-x: 30px; grid-area: 17 / 1 / 19 / 7; border-radius: 30px !important; order: 4;
div.h3: Become a teacher and turn your knowledge into income

div.class: o_colored_level o_grid_item rounded g-col-lg-7 g-height-6 col-lg-7 order-lg-0
div.style: z-index: 0; background-color: rgba(246, 244, 255, 0); --grid-item-padding-x: 30px; grid-area: 19 / 1 / 25 / 8; border-radius: 30px !important; order: 6;
div.p: As a teacher on E-Stic, you can share your knowledge with fellow students and help them succeed in their exams.
You’ll be able to create and publish courses easily, reach a wide community of learners, and get rewarded for your efforts.
Teaching with us is not only a way to earn, but also a chance to build your reputation, improve your skills, and make a real impact on your peers’ academic journey.

div.p: Got an idea for a course we haven’t listed yet? Share your subject proposal with us, and we may create a new opportunity for you to teach it.
Propose an Idea​​

div.p: Join us today and start improving your learning journey !
40 DT
Perfect for focused revision on a single subject.
100 DT
Best for a few subjects — great savings per course.
150 DT
Maximum value for multiple courses — ideal for exam season.

font.h4: Learn More About Our Plans and Spend Less Money

div.p: Our pricing is simple and symbolic, no hidden fees, no subscriptions — just pick the courses you need. Buy single courses for quick revision or save more with value bundles. Designed for students who want straightforward, budget-friendly access to exam-focused lessons.

section.class: s_accordion_image pt56 o_colored_level o_cc o_cc5 pb152

div.class: o_colored_level o_grid_item g-col-lg-6 g-height-7 col-lg-6 order-lg-0
div.p: In this section, you can address common questions efficiently.

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none collapsed
button.span: What services does your company offer ?

div.p: Our company specializes in consulting, product development, and customer support. We tailor our services to fit the unique needs of businesses across various sectors, helping them grow and succeed in a competitive market.

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none collapsed
button.span: How can I contact customer support ?

div.p: You can reach our customer support team by emailing info@yourcompany.example.com, calling +1 555-555-5556, or using the live chat on our website. Our dedicated team is available 24/7 to assist with any inquiries or issues.
We’re committed to providing prompt and effective solutions to ensure your satisfaction.

button.class: accordion-header accordion-button justify-content-between gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none collapsed

div.p: We offer a 30-day return policy for all products. Items must be in their original condition, unused, and include the receipt or proof of purchase. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days of receiving the returned item

span.class: fa fa-question-circle mx-auto d-block bg-o-color-5 text-o-color-2 fa-5x

div.p: Get the latest course releases, study tips, and learning resources delivered to your inbox
